Package com.atakmap.android.preference

Class AtakPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.preference.AtakPreferences
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DrawingPreferences, UnitPreferences
    public class AtakPreferences
extends java.lang.Object
    ATAK core preferences helper which is used to centralize all of the calls to get the shared preference manager

    • Field Summary

      • AtakPreferences

        public AtakPreferences​(android.content.Context appContext)
        Construct an ATAK core preference manager
        Parameters:
        appContext - the application context used by the preference manager

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static AtakPreferences getInstance​(android.content.Context context)
        Return the singleton preferences.
        Parameters:
        context - the context which should be the map context
        Returns:
        the singleton for the preference access Not synchronized as it does not matter much it a few copies are made since they are all backed by the same shared preference.

      • getSharedPrefs

        public android.content.SharedPreferences getSharedPrefs()
        Get the underlying shared preferences object
        Returns:
        Shared preferences

      • set

        public boolean set​(java.lang.String key,
                   java.lang.Object value)
        Set and apply a preference
        Parameters:
        key - Preference key
        value - Preference value (any type)
        Returns:
        True if successful, false if failed

      • remove

        public void remove​(java.lang.String key)
        Remove a preference value from the set
        Parameters:
        key - Preference key

      • contains

        public boolean contains​(java.lang.String key)
        Check if a preference exists in the set
        Parameters:
        key - Preference key
        Returns:
        True if exists

      • get

        public java.lang.String get​(java.lang.String key,
                            java.lang.String defVal)
        Retrieve a String value from the preferences.
        Parameters:
        key - The name of the preference to retrieve.
        defVal - Value to return if this preference does not exist.

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getStringSet​(java.lang.String key)
        Retrieve a string set from the preferences
        Parameters:
        key - Preference key
        Returns:
        String set or null if not found or wrong preference type

      • registerListener

        public void registerListener​(android.content.SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener l)
        Registers a shared preference listener with the AtakPreferences.

        l - the shared preference change listener

      • unregisterListener

        public void unregisterListener​(android.content.SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener l)
        Unregisters a shared preference listener with the AtakPreferences.

        l - the shared preference change listener

      • getStringList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getStringList​(java.lang.String key)
        Retrieve a string array from the preferences, storage is internally defined and it is not recommended to make use of this keys value otherwise.
        Parameters:
        key - Preference key
        Returns:
        String array or null if not found or wrong preference type
